overview: The Great Leader Kanshiram is a 2017 Indian Hindi-language Biopic film directed and produced by Arjun Singh, a 24 year old youth from Gwalior, Madhya Pradesh, India. it is based on true story of DS4, BAMCEF and Bahujan Samaj Party founder, Kanshi Ram from his childhood to 1984.
title: The Great Leader Kanshiram
